hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  # Auto-format with prettier
  if command -v prettier >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true
  fi
  
  # Type check with tsc
  dir=$(dirname "$file_path")
  project_root="$dir"
  while [ "$project_root" != "/" ] && [ ! -f "$project_root/tsconfig.json" ]; do
    project_root=$(dirname "$project_root")
  done
  
  if [ -f "$project_root/tsconfig.json" ]; then
    type_errors=$(cd "$project_root" && npx tsc --noEmit --pretty false 2>&1 | grep "$file_path" | head -5 || true)
    if [ -n "$type_errors" ]; then
      echo "[Hook] TypeScript errors in $file_path:" >&2
      echo "$type_errors" >&2
    fi
  fi
  
  # Check for 'any' usage
  any_usage=$(grep -n ': any' "$file_path" 2>/dev/null | head -3 || true)
  if [ -n "$any_usage" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] 'any' type usage (consider 'unknown'):" >&2
    echo "$any_usage" >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: Auto-format with prettier, type check with tsc, warn about 'any'
